column1: Smoque BBQ////The food here is so amazing. I generally hate BBQ
column2: and my mouth is watering thinking of their brisket sandwich. Mac and cheese is also great
column3: as is their peach cobbler. My only complaint is that we called ahead to order takeout at 3 pm on a Saturday
column4: and it still took over an hour to get
column5: including over 20 minutes waiting in the restaurant before they gave us our takeout. It's the only thing keeping me from coming back all the time
column6: because the food is outrageously good.
